channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: AI May Worsen Ageism in Hiring. Here’s Why
item.description: Finding a new gig if you’re older than 50 may be getting tougher, and the same tech is hitting Gen-Z’s jobs prospects.

item.title: US orders Delta and Aeromexico to dissolve partnership that allowed them to price and schedule their flights jointly and share revenue
item.description: U.S. Transportation Secretary Sean Duffy says Mexico isn't being fair to U.S. airlines.

item.title: Oracle, Andreessen Horowitz consortium will control 80% of TikTok in U.S.: report
item.description: TikTok ‘s U.S. operations would be controlled by an investor consortium including Oracle , Silver Lake and Andreessen Horowitz , under a framework the...

item.title: 5 Reasons to Apply for Inc.’s Best in Business 2025
item.description: Be recognized and celebrated for your company’s successes and how it stands out from the competition.

item.title: Starbucks to add ‘hundreds of thousands of seats’ back to its stores

item.title: Social media posts about Charlie Kirk’s death are baffling companies and exposing a bigger problem in American business
item.description: Advice from experts on how to navigate the nuances of political speech at work.

item.title: Why the First Amendment Doesn’t Stop Employers From Firing Workers Cheering Kirk’s Murder
item.description: The right to free speech won’t protect people from social media posts or public behavior that a company believes would be detrimental to its business.

item.title: Suspect in Coinbase hack kept data for more than 10,000 customers on her phone, court filing alleges
item.description: The lawsuit also said that a Coinbase outsourcer fired human resources employees who were investigating the data breach.

item.title: Humanoid Robot Company Figure Is Valued at $39 Billion. Its Goal Is ‘Human-Level Intelligence’
item.description: Figure announced a $1 billion series C round of funding from investors including Nvidia, Salesforce, Qualcomm Ventures, and more.

item.title: FDA warns Hims & Hers and other weight loss drugmakers to remove ‘false and misleading’ advertising
item.description: The agency on Tuesday posted more than 100 letters with 'cease and desist' language to various drugmakers and online prescribing companies.

item.title: BofA sees gold hitting $4,000 per ounce in the second quarter of 2026. Here’s why the bank sees more room to run after recent record highs
item.description: You've heard that gold is hitting record highs. Not quite, Bank of America's Commodities team says.

item.title: This Fourth-Generation Pork Farmer’s Software Company Has Nearly $5 Million in Revenue
item.description: Iowa-based SwineTech uses AI to help farms take better care of their animals and manage their teams.

item.title: Rivian breaks ground on a $5 billion plant in Georgia amid challenges in the EV market
